shorttext: A 15 ml sublingual spray that has very strong THC potency and is made with MCT oil.
title: Elixir THC MCT Oil Oral Spray (23-25 mg/ml THC)
description: Hexo's THC MCT Oil Oral Spray comes in a childproof spray bottle. This fully activated sublingual oil with muted cannabis terpenes has very strong THC potency. It’s made with MCT oil, without the use of synthetic insecticides or pesticides, and is certified kosher. Each 15 ml bottle yields about 150 mists. It’s also available in peppermint flavour.
